description.value: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Freedom of Movement] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stoneskin] as 4th-level primal innate spells that you can cast once per day. As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.
